description: Sin descripción

name: Alien Infestation
description: Sin descripción

name: Happyland Adventures - Xmas Edition
description: An expansion pack of Happyland Adventures with some Christmas themed maps.

name: Evolution Soccer
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Action 4 Pack
description:
Sonic Action 4 Pack is a PC Collection that was released in 2001.

The games are Sonic the Hedgehog CD and Sonic R, as well as the Sonic & Knuckles Collection which itself includes the PC versions of Sonic the Hedgehog 3, Sonic & Knuckles, and Sonic 3 & Knuckles. The bundle also includes the PC version of the Sega Smash Pack 2, which features Sonic the Hedgehog 2, Shining Force, Vectorman, Super Hang-On, Kid Chameleon, Flicky, Comix Zone, and Sega Swirl.

name: Sega Smash Pack: Twin Pack
description:
In 2002, Sega Smash Pack: Twin Pack was released on PC, and it contained both of the above collections combined.

However, the game had issues when it was played on the Windows XP operating system. One of the issues is that when a user plays Sega Smash Pack 1 under XP, Games suddenly quit without error after a certain amount of time.

name: Magic: The Gathering
description: Magic: The Gathering is a Dreamcast game published and released by Sega in June 2001, though in Japan only. It takes place in the town of Magic Heart, the surrounding areas of Murg, Camat Island, Lydar Forest, Yeluk, Tornell, and The Balance Tower. It includes cards from 6th edition, Alliances, and Tempest. The game included 10 cards unique to it, generally utilizing random mechanics that would be difficult to implement in real-life card play.

name: Evernight
description:
Evernight "The Reign of Darkness" is a strategy game that pits you against other players in a quest to conquer the world of Midia. This world is filled with a vast number of conquerable regions. 
 
Each new player begins with only a single region, however, by deploying your forces and launching calculated attacks into the surrounding regions and player's kingdoms… the player's borders rapidly expand.

name: Bulanci
description: The game sees players battle other Bulanci called EAP (extremely aggressive pillows). It is a 2D game with a top down view. The history within the game follows the trajectory of human history.

name: Acid Moon
description:
Acid Moon is an exciting 3D role play game - action - adventure. 
 
On the planet Acid Moon, in a far galaxy, you slip into the role of the agent Angel, which works for the government there. 
A company named ARGUSA exploit the planet and the workers merciless. 
With the time the discontent among the workers, the so-called Retros, in the silos germinates. 
 
A small group of Retros unites to a group of resistances, which calls red Space, unrest donates and incites the workers! 
Perhaps does it give a traitor with ARGUSA or does put nevertheless somebody else behind? 
This is now the time, where your boss counts on you. 
Its your task to sought out the resistances and put to them the handicraft, before they infiltrate the whole system on Acid Moon. 
Solve the secrets on Acid Moon and be calm on surprises!

name: Hades 2
description:
Hades 2 is a first-person shooter developed by Espaço Informática, a Brazilian company. Espaço Informática placed Hades 2 in the public domain and offered a Freeware download of the game on 20 September 2009 to celebrate the project's 10th anniversary. On the game's opening screen, users can select to play the game in English or Portuguese. The distribution package includes a Portuguese-language manual in Firefox Document format.

Hades 2 was Espaço Informática's biggest hit, selling over 50,000 copies in Brazil with additional distribution in Europe.

name: Alien X
description: Scientists in Sector 8 have opened a portal to another dimension. A dimension that's filled with hellish, homicidal aliens who have entered the ship and killed the entire crew. Carefully weave your way through the space station, and try to stay alive in this impressive, first-person shooter game.

name: Dragon Riders: Chronicles of Pern
description:
The Dragon Riders of Pern have protected their world from the alien oppressor Thread, but now they have all gone extinct. Unless you can find a new rider to take up, the world of Pern is doomed. From this point the game takes the player through four chapters with a vast storyline.

Dragon Riders is a game in 3D with strong RPG and action elements. The world of Pern is based upon the novels by Anne McCaffrey. The game contains over 120 locations on three continents. The player can interact and speak with over 170 characters.

name: Medieval Masters Collection
description:
This compilation pack comes in an oversized box and contains three games:

- Age of Wonders
- Darkstone
- Tzar: The burden of the Crown

name: Scrabble
description: Scrabble is a word game in which two to four players score points by placing tiles, each bearing a single letter, onto a game board divided into a 15×15 grid of squares.

name: Namco Museum
description: The sixth-generation console iteration of Namco Museum, featuring Pac-Man, Pac-Man Arrangement, Galaga, Galaga Arrangement, Dig Dug, Dig Dug Arrangement, Pole Position, Pole Position II, Ms. Pac-Man, Galaxian, Pac-Attack, and Pac-Mania.

name: Bounce
description: Bounce is a game by Nokia that came pre-installed in many Nokia mobile phones running J2ME. It is one of the earlier famous Nokia mobile games, alongside Snake.

name: Platinum Pinball
description: A pinball compilation which consists of other pinball compilations.

name: Pingu and Friends
description: Pingu and Friends is a collection of ten activities for players of any age based on the BBC clay-mated animated children's Pingu TV series. Players use an interactive mitten cursor to interact with many of the game's activities, including dragging objects, counting several items and drawing in the Art Studio activity. Some of the games (particularly 'Save Pinga') only utilise the keyboard arrow keys. The activities are split into two locations: inside Pingu's house and outside the house.

name: Batta Batta: Kejserens Gave
description: Sin descripción

name: Hanamushi
description: Sin descripción

name: Kiwame Mahjong Deluxe: Mirai Senshi 21
description: Goku Mahjong Deluxe: Mirai Senshi 21 is a Miscellaneous game, published by Athena, which was released in Japan in 2001.

name: FOG ...Seek the hidden truth
description: FOG ...Seek the hidden truth is an online-only adventure game set in the Victorian London. The players are members of a private club which help Scotland Yard in their investigations. The challenges mostly consist of finding evidence and solving inventory based puzzles.

name: Les Visiteurs: La Relique De Sainte Rolande
description: Les Visiteurs: La Relique De Sainte Rolande is the sequel to Les Visiteurs: Le Jeu and is based on the film The Visitors II: The Corridors of Time. This time, the sequel is much more action-oriented, and the view is 3rd-person. You must find the parts of the medallion, but also fight, use weapons and even play bowling games.

name: Vital Device: Entrapped by the Queen
description: Vital Device: Entrapped by the Queen is a strategy game developed by Cenozoic Entertainment and published by Aozora Entertainment. in 2001.

name: Mahjong Haoh: Jansou Battle
description: Mahjong Haoh: Jansou Battle is a mahjong game.

name: Aetolia
description:
Aetolia is a multiplayer RPG (role-playing game) set in a gothic-fantasy world. Aetolia is played entirely in text with minimal graphics.

Characters in Aetolia talk, trade, fight, plot and even kill and eat each other. They roam the continents and explore dungeons, killing (or helping) foul creatures, gather gold and treasure while increasing in power and prestige.

Unlike other fantasy settings, Aetolia enables you to play characters of all alignments and creeds, and it's entirely in the hands of the player whether to become a hated villain, vaunted hero, or anything in between.

name: TerraRealms: The Discovery - Episode I
description:
TerraRealms: The Discovery is a 1st person, point-and-click adventure game strongly influenced by games like Myst.

You start in a dark forest with towering trees and a path. As you wander in different directions, you come upon a few caves. In one of them is a tray containing triangular-shaped pieces. By exploring further, find the clue needed to solve the puzzle in the tray. When solved, something else happens. And so the gameplay continues.

name: A2 Racer IV: De Politie slaat terug
description:
Part four in the A2 Racer series includes tracks in Amsterdam, Scheveningen, Berlin, Hamburg and Vienna.

The gameplay of this game continues that of its predecessors with illegal street races on well known high ways and through major European cities.

During the race players will have to collect power-ups like fuel, money and time extensions, while avoiding the police and trying to finish first.

This fourth installment features the Havok Physics Engine for improved car physics, handling and collision.

name: Mario & Luigi
description: Mario & Luigi is an unofficial DOS remake of Super Mario Bros. Just like in the original game, it features Mario the plumber, jumping around, collecting pickups and defeating enemies across Mushroom Kingdom. Mario can find a mushroom which makes him grow, and a fire flower that allows him to shoot fireballs.

name: RoboCop
description: OCP Technologies has developed an organic and mechanical hybrid supercomputer which they've named "The Mind". Unknown to the scientists however, The Mind has secretly been infiltrating computer networks around the world. When the project is finally deemed complete, OCP puts The Mind in control of the security systems of Delta City. At the same time, a gang war erupts in the city and several laboratories are broken into and looted. The police recieve a lead on a gang leader named "Nexx" who may be involved and assign RoboCop, a cyborg law enforcement officer, to bring him in.

name: Wyvern Wings
description: Wyvern Wings Is a shooter with a selection of four different winged fighters to combat invaders. Each winged fighter differs in Power, Speed, Bomb quantity and Special gauge recharge rate. A winged fighter can shoot, activate a defensive barrier, a launch a special bomb and discharge a powerful final impact. The gauge charges over time allowing for the player to make use of the Barrier and Final Impact. As the player successfully destroys invaders, the gauge levels up to allow for multiple attack moves. The player fights through nine stages to find and destroy the big boss vehicles that lead the invasions.

name: Kartoffelpüree: Der Gemüse-Shooter
description: Hordes of vegetables are threatening the earth. Attacking with carrots, green and red pepper and many other units they seek to conquer the planet and enslave the human race. You are given a ship and send out into space to take the fight back to them.

name: Anstoß Action
description:
With Anstoss Action, a football simulation followed in 2001, the data of which can be integrated into Anstoss 3 to Anstoss 3 Action or A3 Action for short (comparable to EA Sports' “Football Fusion” technology).

However, Anstoss Action could not really prevail against the competition from Electronic Arts and caused Ascaron's financial difficulties due to high development costs, which culminated in the first bankruptcy.

name: TomeNet
description: TomeNET is a multiplayer realtime roguelike game, based on and somewhat similar to MAngband and ToME, and also featuring some Zangband and Cthulu Angband monsters.

name: PC Fútbol 2001
description:
PC Fútbol combines both Football Management and an Arcade simulation. The game includes 3D Match-on-line, a multiplayer game mode playable through a modem connection or TCP/IP networks, and a superb 3D simulator engine. Other features include all the major European leagues, and new additions Argentina, Holland, Scotland, Belgium and Portugal.

PC Fútbol gives you the chance to both manage and play as your chosen team, offering both a stand-alone arcade game, or an in-depth managerial simulation.

name: Noctis
description:
Noctis is a computer space flight simulator featuring first-person visual exploration of an imaginary galaxy.

The player is manifested in Noctis as the pilot of spacecraft called a Stardrifter, capable of instantaneous interstellar travel. This allows travelling between stars, refuelling the Stardrifter from Lithium ion-ejecting stars, approaching planets in star systems and their moons, and even landing where it is physically possible. Many planets feature atmospheres and weather effects. Some harbour plants and animals, or even mysterious ruins. No goal or measure of success is imposed by the game: it simply allows the player to catalogue and annotate the player's discoveries in a common database of stellar bodies called the GUIDE, which is to be synchronised over the author's Internet server.

name: Egypte Kids
description: Egypt Kids is an educational video game, released in 2001 for Windows-based PCs. It was developed by EMG and published by Cryo Interactive under the Cryo Kids brand. The game was made in association with Réunion des Musées Nationaux.

name: State of War
description: Sin descripción
